attributes.title: A horrible app 🤮
attributes.review: I just want to say it took freaking TWO days for this app to fully download on my phone. Not to mention once it was downloaded on my phone, my phone crashed entirely for about a WEEK. Can you believe that? This is one of the WORST apps on the App Store and in my opinion should be taken down as soon as possible.

attributes.title: do not download‼️
attributes.review: first, i have to give this app a big 👎🏼. this is the slowest app i've ever downloaded! i hate it. now its making my phone act crazy! its been glitching for weeks and all because this app had bugs. my phone has to pay the damage, disgusting! im not the only one having these problems. apart from that, its also very creepy... all of the sudden, my phone wouldn't let me go back to my home screen when i was using the app. i had to reset my phone multiple times. i was worried because my phone wasn't being itself, im glad i was able to delete it!

attributes.title: Super glitchy
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app my phone started acting really weird. Some of the glitches include turning on the lock screen whenever a minority was near it, making whistling sounds at women, and I keep getting weird phone calls from people in Russia. So very weird and glitchy. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Unprofessional work not good
attributes.review: This took about 2 days to download when I opened the app my phone shot down and I could turn it on for  like two hour when it turn on the app opened and it started glitching so I went out of the app and my flash started to turn on I’m really scared cause I think they might be watching me 😶😟😫

attributes.title: Hi
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to show my support for the president but when I download they asked me for my private information like what size clothes I wear and size shoes it was really creepy but I answered it and then they kept sending me pictures of the private  information so I turn to TikTok so they can help me and they did from now on I never support the 👨‍🦲 President.

attributes.title: Poopy nuts
attributes.review: I come from planet ACAB👽 and I heard about this orange goddess 🍊🍊 from some fellow crackers ❌ who all had MAGA hats on 😵🤡 I decided to go find an app so u could just nut 🥜 to this Jesus in disguise 🤑 all day long 🥵 😤😤 after downloading this app 🤤my body began to shake and my left toe 🙊🐒fell off and began to attack me 🥺😫😧!! Would not recommend ❌😞 your toe will probably fall off 👁👄👁                                                     🍊❌.      🙏

attributes.title: Just...terrible ❌❌❌
attributes.review: Wow I downloaded this app w/ very high expectations, expecting much from MY GREAT president but what I saw was just so so disappointing. Immediately upon downloading the app (which took YEARS) and opening it, I was SHOCKED at what appeared on my screen...it was an ORANGE 🍊😱. It looked so scary and looked like it was about to yell some racist and ignorant remarks at me! 😖 I can’t believe this app was approved by MY president 😔😢😡

attributes.title: Horrific
attributes.review: absolutely despised by this application. as soon as i opened it my phone glitched out. thinking it was my phone being the problem i restarted it and re downloaded the app as well. when i redownloaded the app it continued to glitch and call my a ching chong! this application is racist and irritating would not recommend downloading it unless ur a coloniser.

attributes.title: Absolutely the worst app ever!!!!
attributes.review: Words can’t even describe how long it took to download 🤮🤮 and when it finally did, I was immediately bombarded with hundreds of notifications that were all extremely offensive 🤢🤮🤮😵 this app is disgusting and should be banned!!! Forever!!!! It’s a danger to society and the fact that it’s still up is so wrong 🤒🤕😷🤮🤢😵

attributes.title: You take away our app🧚🏾✨💫we take away yours😌💅🏽😗❤️
attributes.review: This app took two weeks to download😳it has a stench to it😹like I can smell dead possum through the screen 🤢it is useless and take up way to much storage 💀I ordered a 20 piece chicken nugget meal 8 months ago and it still hasn’t arrived 🧚🏾 words cannot describe how bad this app it❤️but numbers can 0/10💅🏽
